entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
